title: The Lighthouse
description: Two outstanding contributors to the world of mystery fiction combine their talents once again to serve up a treat for all fans of fast-paced suspense. Jan and Alix, a young professor and his wife, retreat to a remote coast for a year so that he can research his book. When Jan doesn't return one night, and then the police show up inquiring about a dead body, Alix's worry gives way to dread, as she recalls Jan's recent blackouts and memory lapses.
author: Bill Pronzini
